Buy Loris Azzaro Men's Colognes - Azzaro Twin by Loris Azzaro for Men 2.7 ounce Eau de Toilette Spray. How to use: For long-lasting effects fragrance should be applied to the bodys pulse points. These include the wrist behind the ear crease of your arm and knee and the base of your throat. Also for a lasting effect spraying fragrance lower on.

Product Description

Introduced in 2003. Fragrance notes: The fresh scent of spice woods and musk very sexy. Recommended use: casual.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and in turn the way a scent smells on you. For instance your mood stress level age body chemistry  diet and current medications may all alter the scents you wear. Similarly factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied.
